snippet: Prime Minister Julia Gillard’s proposal for Australia to adopt the second-largest emissions trading scheme in the world cleared its biggest hurdle yet on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Julia Gillard’s proposal for Australia to adopt the second-largest emissions trading scheme in the world cleared its biggest hurdle yet on Wednesday.

headline.main: Australia’s Lower House Narrowly Passes Carbon Tax
headline.print_headline: Australia’s Lower House Narrowly Passes Carbon Tax
headline.seo: In Australia, Carbon Tax Narrowly Passes Lower House
